description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. A gang of seven notorious outlaws has been getting out of hand. They think they are the toughest gunfighters in the state. Teach those scoundrels a lesson! Pull out your revolver and shoot down the bad guys.
description.short: A gang of seven notorious outlaws has been getting out of hand. They think they are the toughest gunfighters in the state. Teach those scoundrels a lesson! Pull out your revolver and shoot down the bad guys.
